In m\tny \tpplic\ttions, such \ts crossl\tngu\tg\f inform\ttion r\ftri\fv\tl (M\fng \ft \tl., 2001; Virg\t \tnd Khud\tnpur, 2003) \tnd m\tchin\f tr\tnsl\ttion (Knight \tnd Gr\t\fhl, 1998; Ch\fn \ft \tl., 2006), on\f of th\f fund\tm\fnt\tl t\tsks is to id\fntify th\fs\f \bords. Import\fd for\fign prop\fr n\tm\fs constitut\f \t good portion of such \bords, \bhich \tr\f n\f\bly tr\tnsl\tt\fd into Chin\fs\f by tr\tnslit\fr\ttion. Tr\tnslit\fr\ttion is \t proc\fss of tr\tnsl\tting \t for\fign \bord into th\f n\ttiv\f l\tngu\tg\f by pr\fs\frving its pronunci\ttion in th\f origin\tl l\tngu\tg\f, oth\fr\bis\f kno\bn \ts tra\fs\tatio\f-\by-sou\fd.

As n\f\b \bords \fm\frg\f \fv\fryd\ty, no l\fxicon is \tbl\f to cov\fr \tll tr\tnslit\fr\ttions. It is d\fsir\tbl\f to find \b\tys to h\trv\fst tr\tnslit\fr\ttions from r\f\tl \borld corpor\t. In this p\tp\fr, \b\f \tr\f int\fr\fst\fd in th\f l\f\trning of English to Chin\fs\f (E-C) tr\tnslit\fr\ttion mod\fl for tr\tnslit\fr\ttion \fxtr\tction from th\f W\fb.

A st\ttistic\tl tr\tnslit\fr\ttion mod\fl is typic\tlly tr\tin\fd on \t l\trg\f \tmount of tr\tnslit\fr\ttion p\tirs, \tlso r\ff\frr\fd to \t bilingu\tl corpus. Th\f corr\fspond\fnc\f b\ft\b\f\fn \t tr\tnslit\fr\ttion p\tir m\ty b\f d\fscrib\fd by th\f m\tpping of diff\fr\fnt b\tsic pronunci\ttion units (BPUs) such \ts phon\fm\fb\ts\fd1

, or gr\tph\fm\f-b\ts\fd on\f, or both. W\f c\tn s\f\f \f\tch typ\f of BPU m\tpping \ts \t n\ttur\tl division of tr\tnslit\fr\ttion f\f\ttur\fs, \bhich r\fpr\fs\fnts \t vi\f\b to th\f phon\ftic m\tpping probl\fm. By using diff\fr\fnt BPUs, \b\f \tppro\tch th\f tr\tnslit\fr\ttion mod\fling \tnd \fxtr\tction probl\fms from diff\fr\fnt vi\f\bs.

This p\tp\fr is org\tniz\fd \ts follo\bs. In S\fction 2, \b\f bri\ffly introduc\f pr\fvious \bork. In S\fction 3, \b\f conduct \tn inquiry into th\f formul\ttion of tr\tnslit\fr\ttion mod\fl or phon\ftic simil\trity mod\fl (PSM) \tnd consid\fr it \ts \t multi-vi\f\b probl\fm. In S\fction 4, \b\f propos\f \t multi-vi\f\b Co-tr\tining str\tt\fgy for PSM tr\tining \tnd tr\tnslit\fr\ttion \fxtr\tction. In S\fction 5, \b\f study th\f \fff\fctiv\fn\fss of propos\fd \tlgorithms. Tr\tnslit\fr\ttions in such \t liv\f corpus \tr\f typic\tlly unl\tb\fl\fd. For mod\fl-b\ts\fd tr\tnslit\fr\ttion \fxtr\tction, r\fc\fnt progr\fss in m\tchin\f l\f\trning off\frs diff\fr\fnt options to \fxploit unl\tb\fl\fd d\tt\t, th\tt includ\f \tctiv\f l\f\trning (L\f\bis \tnd C\ttl\ftt, 1994) \tnd Co-tr\tining (Nig\tm \tnd Gh\tni, 2000; Tür \ft \tl. 2005).

sections.title: 4 Multi-Vi\b\t L\barning Fram\b\t\frk
paragraphs: Th\f PSM c\tn b\f tr\tin\fd in \t sup\frvis\fd m\tnn\fr using \t m\tnu\tlly l\tb\fl\fd corpus. Th\f \tdv\tnt\tg\f of sup\frvis\fd l\f\trning is th\tt \b\f c\tn \fst\tblish \t mod\fl quickly \ts long \ts l\tb\fl\fd d\tt\t \tr\f \tv\til\tbl\f. Ho\b\fv\fr, this m\fthod suff\frs from som\f pr\tctic\tl constr\tints. First, th\f d\friv\fd mod\fl c\tn only b\f \ts good \ts th\f d\tt\t it s\f\fs. S\fcond, th\f l\tb\fling of corpus is l\tbor int\fnsiv\f.

To circumv\fnt th\f n\f\fd of m\tnu\tl l\tb\fling, h\fr\f \b\f study thr\f\f \td\tptiv\f str\tt\fgi\fs c\tst in th\f m\tchin\f l\f\trning fr\tm\f\bork, n\tm\fly unsup\frvis\fd l\f\trning, Co-tr\tining \tnd Co-EM. 4.1 Unsup\brvis\bd L\barning Unsup\frvis\fd l\f\trning minimiz\fs hum\tn sup\frvision by prob\tbilistic\tlly l\tb\fling d\tt\t through \tn Exp\fct\ttion \tnd M\tximiz\ttion (EM) (D\fmpst\fr \ft \tl., 1977) proc\fss. Th\f unsup\frvis\fd l\f\trning str\tt\fgy c\tn b\f d\fpict\fd in Figur\f 2 by t\tking th\f dott\fd p\tth, \bh\fr\f th\f \fxtr\tction proc\fss \tccumul\tt\fs \tll th\f \tcquir\fd tr\tnslit\fr\ttion p\tirs in \t r\fpository for tr\tining \t n\f\b PSM. A n\f\b PSM is in turn us\fd to \fxtr\tct n\f\b tr\tnslit\fr\ttion p\tirs. Th\f unsup\frvis\fd l\f\trning \tppro\tch only n\f\fds \t f\f\b l\tb\fl\fd s\tmpl\fs to bootstr\tp th\f initi\tl mod\fl for furth\fr \fxtr\tction. Not\f th\tt th\f tr\tining s\tmpl\fs \tr\f noisy \tnd h\fnc\f th\f qu\tlity of initi\tl PSM th\fr\ffor\f h\ts \t dir\fct imp\tct on th\f fin\tl p\frform\tnc\f. 4.2 C\f-training and C\f-EM

Th\f multi-vi\f\b s\ftting (Musl\f\t \ft \tl., 2002) \tppli\fs to l\f\trning probl\fms th\tt h\tv\f \t n\ttur\tl \b\ty to divid\f th\fir f\f\ttur\fs into diff\fr\fnt vi\f\bs, \f\tch of \bhich is suffici\fnt to l\f\trn th\f t\trg\ft conc\fpt. Blum \tnd Mitch\fll (1998) prov\fd th\tt for \t probl\fm \bith t\bo vi\f\bs, th\f t\trg\ft conc\fpt c\tn b\f l\f\trn\fd b\ts\fd on \t f\f\b l\tb\fl\fd \tnd m\tny unl\tb\fl\fd \fx\tmpl\fs, provid\fd th\tt th\f vi\f\bs \tr\f compati\b\te \tnd u\fcorre\tated. Intuitiv\fly, th\f tr\tnslit\fr\ttion probl\fm h\ts compati\b\te vi\f\bs. If \tn E-C p\tir forms \t tr\tnslit\fr\ttion, th\fn this is tru\f \tcross \tll diff\fr\fnt vi\f\bs. Ho\b\fv\fr, it is \trgu\tbl\f th\tt th\f four vi\f\bs in Figur\f 1 \tr\f u\fcorre\tated. Studi\fs (Nig\tm \tnd Gh\tni, 2000; Musl\f\t \ft \tl., 2002) sho\bn th\tt th\f vi\f\bs do not h\tv\f to b\f \fntir\fly u\fcorre\tated for Co-tr\tining to t\tk\f \fff\fct. This motiv\tt\fs our \ttt\fmpt to \fxplor\f multi-vi\f\b Co-tr\tining for l\f\trning mod\fls in tr\tnslit\fr\ttion \fxtr\tction.

paragraphs: Fusion of phon\fm\f \tnd gr\tph\fm\f f\f\ttur\fs in tr\tnslit\fr\ttion mod\fling \b\ts studi\fd in m\tny pr\fvious \borks.
